name: Growing Out
description:
Mr. Blob is a tiny blob trapped in a deep, dark dungeon. As Mr. Blob explores, he discovers magical gum which allows him to grow in size and grants him special powers. While the additional powers help Mr. Blob explore, the added size also makes it tough to fit into tight spots. If Mr. Blob keeps growing bigger and bigger, will he be able to get out of the dungeon before running out of space? Lets find out!

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys = Move

X = Jump

C = Shoot (Once Unlocked)
